nodes.text: Inspector was the formal title given to a detective with the Coruscant Security Force or other law enforcement agencies. Generally they were experienced police officers who investigated serious crimes. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, inspector was a rank within the Inspectorate. The Imperial rank of Lieutenant-Inspector also existed within that organization. Thanoth worked as an inspector for the Inspectorate and was assigned to Darth Vader shortly after the Battle of Yavin.
